'''Loach Pearls''' are items obtained from Loaches. Currently, the Loach Pearl has no usage except in the [[Parametric Transformer]].

==How to Obtain==
Loach Pearls are obtained from catching [[Loaches]], which can be found in [[Bishui Plain]], notably around [[Dihua Marsh]] and [[Stone Gate]]. They can also be found on [[Watatsumi Island]] and in [[Enkanomiya]].

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=82 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
